name: JConfigRegister
short_description: Calculator for the 4-digit hexadecimal "configuration register" used in Cisco routers for bootup settings. It is meant to be an open source (GPLv3) and cross-platform alternative to the freeware program boson.com hosts.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 3.0 (GPLv3)

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: System Administrators
